summary: This bill, the "Preserving Patient Access to Home Infusion Act," aims to clarify congressional intent and maintain patient access to home infusion therapy under the Medicare program. It amends the Social Security Act to include pharmacy services, adjust payment structures to reflect time spent on infusion, clarify billing for non-pump drugs and biologicals, and modify payments for home infusion supplies and plans of care, effective January 1, 2026. The bill also allows nurse practitioners and physician assistants to participate in establishing and reviewing home infusion plans of care.
